lines.gurmukhi: rcnw cirqR icqR ibsm bicqRpn; eyk mY Anyk BwNiq Aink pRkwr hY [

Unknown.translation: The picture of miraculous creation of the Lord is full of astonishment and wonder. How has He spread such countless variations and diversities in this one picture?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kIh d`sIey! ies isRStI rcnw dy cilqR kOquk dw icqR bu`q nkSw jo swmny idKweI dy irhw hY iesdw bicqRpn AdBuq AnoKw pxw ibsm hrwn krx hwrw hY dyKo[ iks qrHwˆ dI iek dy AMdr Anyk pRkwr dI Anykqw AnMqqw aus krqwr ny vrqweI hoeI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: locn mY idRsit sRvn mY suriq rwKI; nwskw subws rs rsnw aucwr hY [

Unknown.translation: He has filled energy in the eyes to see, in the ears to hear, in the nostrils to smell and in the tongue to taste and relish.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: nyqRwˆ AMdr qwˆ idRsit q`kn dI SkqI pw rKI sU qy kMnwˆ AMdr sunx dI SkqI AYsw hI nwswˆ ivKy sugMDI qQw rsnw ivKy rs sÍwd gRihx krn Ar aucwrx dI SkqI itkweI hoeI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: AMqr hI AMqr inrMqrIn soqRn mY; kwhU kI n koaU jwnY ibKm bIcwr hY [

Unknown.translation: What is difficult to understand is that each of these senses has so much difference in them that one does not know how the other is engaged.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ien sRoqn mY inrMqr AMqr hI AMqr eynwˆ sRoqwˆ ieMdRIAwˆ dy AMdr hI AMdr lgwqwr AMqrw pw rKÎw sU[ vw AMqRwX qoˆ pVdy qoˆ rihq koeI ieko hI iek rs smwn s`qw rmI hoeI SkqI, inrMqr kMm kr rhI hY[ pr vIcwr Es dw ibKVw durgm hY ik kIkUM auh iek huMdI BI Anykwˆ ho rhI hY; jÎoˆik iksy nUM koeI dUAw nhIˆ jwx irhw Bwv ieko dy bl nwl kMm krdy hoey ieMdRy Awpo ivc iek dUey dw ibrqwˆq nhIˆ jwx skdy[ AQvw AYauˆ ik ienwˆ sRoqn ieMdRIAwˆ dy AMqr AMdr inrMqr smweI hoeI BI auh smwn s`qw hY, pr sB ivKy AMqr pVdw pw riKAw sU, ijs kr ky koeI ieMdRI iksy dUeI dI ivQÎw nUM nhIˆ jwx rhI[ so ikfw AauKw iesdw smJnw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: Agm cirqR icqR jwnIAY icqyro kYso; nyq nyq nyq nmo nmo nmskwir hY [232[

Unknown.translation: The picture of creation of the Lord that is beyond comprehension, how can then its creator and His creation be understood? He is limitless, infinite in all the three periods and is worthy of salutations repeatedly. (232)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ies icqR meI cliqR dw jwnxw hI jd Agm phuMc qoˆ smJo dUr hY qwˆ ies dy icqyry icqrnhwry nUM koeI kIkUM jwx sky[ qwˆ qy mn bwxI srIr nyiq nyiq nyiq AwKdw hoXw iqs dy qwˆeI nmskwr hI krdw hwˆ ]232]
